I make handmade items -- such as spiral-bound notebooks, buttons, magnets and pocket mirrors -- mostly out of recycled materials. And I sell them online and through various stores around the world.
I also do custom graphic design work on a freelance basis.

As people are assisted to become productive participants of their community, people, families, and whole communities began to experience shalom. Shalom is the gospel (Genesis 1:28, Revelation 21:5-7).

lender.name: Kobe-Maru Go

KAUFMAN Then when you walked away, she started making fun of you with Kim Canetti. It was like they were laughing at me. You didn't know at all. You seemed so happy.
DONALD I knew. I heard them.
KAUFMAN How come you looked so happy?
DONALD I loved Sarah, Charles. It was mine, that love. I owned it. Even Sarah didn't have the right to take it away. I can love whoever I want.
KAUFMAN She thought you were pathetic.
DONALD That was her business, not mine. You are what you love, not what loves you. That's what I decided a long time ago.
